text:
Markdown string interpolation breaks if there are two `$`
```julia> md"a=$(a)"
  a=5

julia> md"a=$(a), b=$(b)"
  a=(a), b=(b)```

elements.text: Markdown string interpolation breaks if there are two

julia> md"a=$(a)"
  a=5

julia> md"a=$(a), b=$(b)"
  a=(a), b=(b)

text: Also string interpolation doesn’t work inside a markdown table?

elements.text: Also string interpolation doesn’t work inside a markdown table?
